name: redirect-trace
title: Redirect Trace
description: Developer tool to trace URL redirects and analyze redirect chains. Perfect for debugging, SEO analysis, and checking shortened URLs.
author: nurkamol

commands.name: trace-redirects
commands.title: Trace URL Redirects
commands.subtitle: Analyze redirect chains and inspect HTTP responses
commands.description: Trace URL redirects, analyze chains, and inspect HTTP responses. Supports long URLs via clipboard.

preferences.name: maxRedirects
preferences.title: Max Redirects
preferences.description: Maximum number of redirects to follow

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
